HOME.COMPUTER_SCIENTIST_LIST_MSG: Howdy! Here's a list of awesome computer scientists. Do you know any others? Add to the list yourself.

ABOUT.TITLE: Angular Seed is a starter project that implements best practices in coding, building and testing Angular apps.
ABOUT.F1: Ready to go, statically typed build system using Gulp for working with TypeScript.
ABOUT.F3: Sample unit tests with Jasmine and Karma including code coverage via Istanbul.
ABOUT.F7: Basic Service Worker, which implements "Cache then network strategy".
